text: Gunnar Fischer (November 18, 1910 – June 11, 2011) was a Swedish cinematographer and writer. He is known for having filmed several movies directed by Ingmar Bergman. He was married to the sister of Åke Söderblom. == References == Category:1910 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Cinematographers Category:Swedish children's writers
title: Gunnar Fischer
